name: FetchRecentPausedIncidentAlerts
description:
Fetch recent paused and resolved incident alerts.

This tool retrieves the five most recent alerts triggered and resolved after being paused within a specified reporting period of up to 6 months. It's available with the Event Intelligence package or Digital Operations plan.
